level.heading: Appropriation.
level.text: There is hereby authorized to be appropriated out of the general revenues of the District of Columbia government sufficient funds to carry out the requirements of this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-65, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-831.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-13, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-832.
